name: TC-15-P :: Search for a Product using a Keyword

actions.action: Enter a product name into the "Search" input box at the top of the page.
actions.expectedResult: The product name is successfully entered in the search box.

actions.action: Press the "Enter" key or click the search icon to submit.
actions.expectedResult: The search results page is loaded

actions.action: Verify that the product card containing the product name is visible on the page.
actions.expectedResult: At least one product card containing the product name appears in the search results.
